data.eml:eml: Papatuka alamunyiga Deans, a new genus and species of apterous ensign wasp (Hymenoptera: Evaniidae) from Kenya

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deans, Andrew R. (2002): Papatuka alamunyiga Deans, a new genus and species of apterous ensign wasp (Hymenoptera: Evaniidae) from Kenya. Zootaxa 95: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155945
